data.actual_result: The slider returns to initial position
data.expected_result: The slowmode slider should stay at its position
data.short_description: Toggling NSFW in channel settings resets the slowmode slider
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to channel settings - Move the slowmode slider so the unsaved changes icon appears. Don't click Save yet - Toggle NSFW (or change notification settings, does it as well)
